did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections and University Archives, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.
did.langmaterial: Materials in the collection are in English.
did.abstract: The Spring Housekeeper's List is from a store called Francisco in Danville, VA. It includes a list of food offerings and varieties, some with prices.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Spring Housekeeper's List must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Spring Housekeeper's List, Ms2019-025, Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Spring Housekeeper's List (broadside) was purchased by Special Collections in 2018.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Spring Housekeeper's List was completed in June 2019.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Spring Housekeeper's List is from a store called Francisco in Danville, VA. The list is a broadside. It includes a list of food offerings and varieties, some with prices. Food offerings include condiments, sauces, olives, pickles, canned meats, peppers, preserves, jellies, sea foods, wafers, crackers, farinaceous foods, canned fruits and vegetables, cheese, coffees and teas, and sundries.

odd.head: Rights Statements for Archival Description
odd.p: The guide to the Spring Housekeeper's List by Special Collections and University Archives, Virginia Tech, is licensed under a CC0 (https://creativecommons.org/share-your-work/public-domain/cc0/).
